title: Juugo Shounen Hyouryuuki: Kaizokujima de! Daibouken
synopsis: The film is based on the Jules Verne novel "Adrift in the Pacific: Two Years Holiday" published in 1888. A group of youngsters find themselves adrift at sea, and after a terrible storm they are cast upon a deserted island, where they must learn to get along with each other in order to survive.
related_anime: ['Hitomi no Naka no Shounen: Juugo Shounen Hyouryuuki', 'Juugo Shounen Hyouryuuki']
voices: ['Toyosaki, Aki', 'Nakatsu, Mari', 'Ono, Kensho', 'Matsukata, Hiroki', 'Matsumoto, Rica', 'Ono, Karin']
